Class AbstractConfigureMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • biz.paluch.maven.configurator.AbstractConfigureMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigureArtifactMojo, ConfigureFileMojo, ConfigureMojo

    public abstract class AbstractConfigureMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Abstract base to perform configuration.
